original_text:
Casino Island II
Preparatevi per un’avventura in pieno stile marinaresco: costruite l’albero, la vela e salpate solcando i mari che vi conducono verso l’isola! Nessun tema fantascientifico per questa slot prodotta dalla software house Williams Interactive (WMS), nessuna animazione tridimensionale e niente effetti speciali, solo una grafica asciutta ed essenziale che fa da sfondo al gioco senza risultare invadente.
La scelta di un compartimento grafico ridotto così ai minimi termini è funzionale al gameplay, che viene messo in risalto e permette al giocatore di concentrarsi solo sul gioco, senza altre “distrazioni”.
Il mare, l’isola, i simboli, sono tutti riprodotti in maniera molto semplice, quasi stilizzata, e se a qualcuno potrebbe mancare un po’ di movimento in più, altri sicuramente apprezzeranno la scelta del provider di puntare tutto sulla modalità di gioco.
La WMS del resto non si distingue di certo per l’innovazione in ambito grafico, come invece hanno deciso di fare altri provider, quanto piuttosto su gameplay spesso poco convenzionali e innovativi, che riescono comunque a regalare agli appassionati delle esperienze ludiche soddisfacenti e abbastanza coinvolgenti.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Casino Island II è sicuramente un gioco divertente da provare se ci si vuole avventurare in qualcosa di leggermente diverso dalle slot machine tradizionali: i simboli a tema marinaresco sui rulli nascondono funzionalità speciali e il mare che si staglia davanti ai giocatori è ricco di premi molto interessanti!
Con il gioco base, impostato su una struttura a cinque rulli e nove linee di pagamento, è possibile ottenere delle vincite fino a quaranta volte il valore della puntata, ma è con il jackpot, raggiungibile scommettendo il massimo consentito, che si possono portare a casa ben 30.000 monete!
Le puntate possono essere effettuate a partire a 0,01 fino a 45 monete, range ottimo per una slot di questo genere, che risulta essere molto versatile e soddisfa una vasta gamma di giocatori dal budget differente.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore di Casino Island II ci stupisce piacevolmente: con il suo 96,9% è ben al di sopra della media non solo dei giochi dello stesso provider ma anche della maggior parte dei giochi di slot in generale.
Simboli e funzionalità di Casino Island II
I simboli di Casino Island II sono interamente tematici e fanno riferimento al mondo marinaresco. Ad alternarsi sui rulli troviamo infatti gabbiani, velieri, un timone, un faro, delle bussole, dei forzieri, ancore, dei salvagenti a ciambella e la campana di una nave. Questo gioco non ha un simbolo Wild, ma c’è uno Scatter rappresentato dalla una piccola barca a vela.
Quando lo Scatter compare per due volte sui rulli, in qualsiasi posizione su una linea di pagamento attiva, si accede a un mini-gioco che permette di portare a casa premi assai interessanti: durante il bonus game i giocatori dovranno navigare verso l’isola, schivando rocce e imprevisti che troveranno sul loro cammino. Se si riesce a raggiungere l’isola si verrà ricompensati da un moltiplicatore compreso tra 5x e 40x. Anche se si colpiscono le rocce si otterrà un moltiplicatore chiamato Rock Award che vale fino a 3x il valore della scommessa.
Il premio più alto lo si può ottenere quando il simbolo del forziere compare su tutti i cinque rulli dopo una puntata massima: si vincerà in questo modo il jackpot pari a 30.000 monete!

raw_translation.response:
Get ready for a nautical adventure with Casino Island II. Build your mast, hoist your sail and set off across the seas towards the island! Produced by software house Williams Interactive (WMS), this slot game has no science fiction theme, no 3D animations, and no special effects. Its simple graphics serve as a backdrop to the game and don’t distract the player from the gameplay. 

The maritime theme is portrayed in a simple, stylized way without unnecessary animations. Some players may miss the visual action, but others will appreciate the provider’s focus on gameplay. While WMS may not be known for their graphics, they do offer innovative and unconventional gameplay that appeals to gaming enthusiasts looking for a satisfying and engaging experience.

The main features of Casino Island II include nine paylines on five reels, symbols with a nautical theme, and special functions hidden behind the symbols. With the base game, players can win up to 40 times their bet, but the real prize is the jackpot of 30,000 coins, which can be won with the maximum bet. The betting range is suitable for players with different budgets.

Casino Island II offers players a return-to-player (RTP) rate of 96.9%, which is higher than the average for the same provider and for most slot games in general. The symbols in Casino Island II are all related to the maritime theme, including seagulls, schooners, a compass, a lighthouse, treasure chests, anchors, lifesavers, and the bell of a ship. There is no Wild symbol, but there is a Scatter represented by a small sailboat. When the Scatter appears twice on the reels in any active payline, players gain access to a mini-game that can result in significant prizes. Players must navigate toward the island, dodging rocks and other obstacles along the way. If they reach the island successfully, players can receive a multiplier of between 5x and 40x. Even if they hit the rocks, there is still a Rock Award multiplier worth up to 3x the value of the wager. If the treasure chest symbol appears on all five reels with the maximum bet, players win the jackpot of 30,000 coins!

raw_translation.response:
Get ready for a seafaring adventure with Casino Island II! Produced by Williams Interactive (WMS), this slot machine offers a simple and essential graphic design that provides a background for the game without being invasive. While there are no 3D animation or special effects, the limited graphics only highlight the gameplay, allowing players to focus solely on the game without any distractions. The sea, the island, and the symbols are all depicted in a simple and stylized manner, with no excess movement to take away from the gameplay. This choice by the provider emphasizes the quality of the gameplay above all else, which is where WMS truly shines. While other providers may focus on graphic innovation, WMS offers unconventional and innovative gameplay that still provides satisfying and engaging experiences for passionate players.

The main features of this slot machine include the ability to win up to forty times your bet with five reels and nine paylines in the base game. However, by placing the maximum bet, players can reach the jackpot and win up to 30,000 coins! This game offers a versatile range of bets, starting at 0.01 and going up to 45 coins, making it a great choice for players with different budgets. The theoretical Return to Player (RTP) of Casino Island II is an impressive 96.9%, well above the median for not only the same provider but also for most slot games in general.

The symbols in Casino Island II are entirely thematic and refer to the seafaring world, with seagulls, sailboats, helm, lighthouses, compasses, treasure chests, anchors, life buoys, and a ship's bell appearing on the reels. While there is no Wild symbol, there is a Scatter represented by a small sailboat. When the Scatter appears twice on the reels in any position on an active payline, players gain access to a mini-game that offers very interesting prizes. During the bonus game, players have to navigate their way towards the island, avoiding rocks and other obstacles along the way. If players manage to reach the island, they can receive a multiplier of 5x to 40x, and even hitting rocks will award players with a Rock Award multiplier valued up to 3x their bet. The biggest prize of all is achieved when the treasure chest symbol appears on all five reels, resulting in a jackpot of 30,000 coins!

Overall, Casino Island II is an enjoyable and unique slot machine worth trying out for players looking for something a little different from traditional slot machines. As an experienced gambler, you'll appreciate the simplicity of the gameplay and the potential for high payouts. Give it a spin and explore the high seas for yourself!

Get ready for a seafaring adventure with Casino Island II! Produced by Williams Interactive (WMS), this slot machine offers a simple and essential graphic design that provides a background for the game without being invasive. While there are no 3D animation or special effects, the limited graphics only highlight the gameplay, allowing players to focus solely on the game without any distractions. The sea, the island, and the symbols are all depicted in a simple and stylized manner, with no excess movement to take away from the gameplay. This choice by the provider emphasizes the quality of the gameplay above all else, which is where WMS truly shines. While other providers may focus on graphic innovation, WMS offers unconventional and innovative gameplay that still provides satisfying and engaging experiences for passionate players.

The main features of this slot machine include the ability to win up to forty times your bet with five reels and nine paylines in the base game. However, by placing the maximum bet, players can reach the jackpot and win up to 30,000 coins! This game offers a versatile range of bets, starting at 0.01 and going up to 45 coins, making it a great choice for players with different budgets. The theoretical Return to Player (RTP) of Casino Island II is an impressive 96.9%, well above the median for not only the same provider but also for most slot games in general.

The symbols in Casino Island II are entirely thematic and refer to the seafaring world, with seagulls, sailboats, helm, lighthouses, compasses, treasure chests, anchors, life buoys, and a ship's bell appearing on the reels. While there is no Wild symbol, there is a Scatter represented by a small sailboat. When the Scatter appears twice on the reels in any position on an active payline, players gain access to a mini-game that offers very interesting prizes. During the bonus game, players have to navigate their way towards the island, avoiding rocks and other obstacles along the way. If players manage to reach the island, they can receive a multiplier of 5x to 40x, and even hitting rocks will award players with a Rock Award multiplier valued up to 3x their bet. The biggest prize of all is achieved when the treasure chest symbol appears on all five reels, resulting in a jackpot of 30,000 coins!

Overall, Casino Island II is an enjoyable and unique slot machine worth trying out for players looking for something a little different from traditional slot machines. As an experienced gambler, you'll appreciate the simplicity of the gameplay and the potential for high payouts. Give it a spin and explore the high seas for yourself!

response.headline: Symbols and Bonus Game
response.content:
Who doesn't love the sea? The smell of the salty ocean breeze, the sound of waves crashing into the shore, and the occasional mermaid sighting. Casino Island II is packed with seafaring symbols that will make you want to set sail and never come back. While there's sadly no wild symbol, there is a scatter. But don't worry, it's not the kind of scatter that makes you sneeze. It's a cute little sailboat that can trigger a mini-game if it appears twice on the reels in any position on an active payline.

In the bonus game, you get to be the captain of the ship! You have to navigate your way through the treacherous waters surrounding the island while avoiding rocks and other obstacles. Talk about an adventure! If you manage to reach the island, you can receive a multiplier of 5x to 40x. And even hitting rocks can be rewarding - who knew? There's a Rock Award multiplier valued up to 3x your bet if you do! And if you're lucky enough to get five treasure chest symbols on all five reels, you could win a jackpot of 30,000 coins! That's enough to make anyone want to set sail, isn't it?

response.headline: BONUS GAME
response.content:
Who doesn't love a good bonus game? Casino Island II has got an exciting mini-game that's sure to keep players on the edge of their seats. All you need to do is get two Scatter symbols on the reels and you're off to the races. Quite literally. You'll have to navigate your way towards the island, dodging rocks and trying not to sink your ship.

It's like playing an old-school video game crossed with a slot machine. It's like the folks over at the casino were stuck in a time warp - but we're not complaining. Who wouldn't want to feel like they're a swashbuckling pirate, braving the high seas for treasure?

The best part about this bonus game is the potential payout. Depending on how well you navigate your ship, you could end up with a multiplier of anywhere from 5x to 40x your bet. That's like hitting the jackpot on your bonus game! Get a little careless, though, and you might end up with a Rock Award multiplier. Don't worry - it's not as bad as it sounds. You could still end up with a multiplier worth up to 3x your original bet. Not too shabby, right?

Of course, the real prize is the jackpot. And it's no measly prize, either - it's 30,000 coins! That's like… a lot of coins. Enough to retire and live on your own private island, maybe. Okay, maybe not that much, but it's still a pretty sweet payout. All you need to do is get the treasure chest symbol on all five reels. Easy peasy, right? We're not saying it's going to be a walk in the park, but it's definitely worth the effort.

The reels feature symbols such as seagulls, sailboats, helm, lighthouses, compasses, treasure chests, anchors, life buoys, and a ship's bell. There is no Wild symbol, but there is a Scatter represented by a small sailboat.

Design

Casino Island II offers a simple and stylized graphic design that highlights the gameplay. The sea, the island, and the symbols are all depicted in a simple manner, with no excess movement to take away from the gameplay. The limited graphics only serve as a background for the game without being invasive or distracting. Williams Interactive offers unconventional and innovative gameplay that still provides satisfying and engaging experiences for passionate players.
